name: Hina Mincho
description: Hina Mincho is old-fashined and cute Japanese font. It includes Google Latin Plus, hiragana, katakana, JIS level 1 and 2 kanji glyphs. This font is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. To contribute to the project, visit github.com/satsuyako/Hina-Mincho
author: Satsuyako
